greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominator of Sum_{1<=k<=n, gcd(k,n)=1} 1/k.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2310
formula: G.f. A(x) (for fractions) satisfies: A(x) = -log(1 - x)/(1 - x) - Sum_{k>=2} A(x^k)/k. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Mar 31 2020
mathematica: Table[s=0; Do[If[GCD[i, n]==1, s=s+1/i], {i, n}]; Denominator[s], {n, 1, 35}]
xref: Also denominators of row sums of A111879/A111880. For the numerators see A111881.
results.author: Sharon Sela (sharonsela(AT)hotmail.com), Apr 12 2002
